title: Life's Journeys
description: At 29, Sophie's future is clear, sheâ€™ll rise through the ranks to take the reins of an international conglomerate determined that neither mortal man nor corporate games can thwart her. Not, anyway, until an international merger diverts her climb down a cul-de-sac where one hurdle too many provokes her to fight back.
author: Laura Rittenhouse
